rooms.description:
You are in the foyer of a giant, abandoned mansion. There are 5 empty pedestals in the room. The front door is locked, with a note attached: "Before I can let you go, I need you to help me. As you can see, my prized possessions are missing. Someone stole them and hid them around my mansion. Help me, and you will leave this place unharmed. Refuse, and you will join me in the afterlife."
There is a door leading to the east wing, a red door leading to the west wing, and stairs leading upstairs.

rooms.description: You arrive on a landing. There is a doorway leading to the master bedroom, as well as one leading down a hallway, presumably containing more bedrooms. The entrance to this hallway, however, has long since fallen in on itself. You can also go back downstairs.

rooms.description: You open the door to the master bedroom, but it is pitch black. The only thing you can make out is an empty fuse box near the door. You should head back until you can find some light.

rooms.description:
the room has pictures of skeletons with trumpets covering every inch of the wall. There is also a note, written in comic sans: 
"Come join the skeleton army. doot doot until you find the maximum dootage. then go full doot! "
You think you have stumbled upon something, but that the greater mystery still to be found. There are no other doors to this room besides the one to the master bedroom.

rooms.description: The bathroom is in a state of utter disarray. The toilet, bathtub, and sink are all water stained and covered in cobwebs. The only door is to the master bedroom.

rooms.description: You enter a long hallway lined with family photos. The more you look at them, the more you feel them look back at you, angrily. Suddenly, the door behinds you slams shut, and you hear ghostly laughter. You try and open the door, but it is locked. You are trapped. From here you can go to the dining room, kitchen, or parlor.

dynamic descriptions.description:
*DOOT*
You return to the east wing. The ghostly stares in the family photos are gone, as if the ghosts of this place now accept your presence. From here you can go to the dining room, kitchen, parlor, or foyer.
*DOOT*

*DOOT*

rooms.description: You enter the dining room. It is utterly decayed with chairs flung randomly around the room. You get strange, ghostly vibe from this place. There is only the door to the east wing.

dynamic descriptions.description: Upon entering the dining room, candles immediately light on the table. All the chairs push themselves in except for one at the head of the table. You feel a ghostly presence, urging you to sit down.

*DOOT*
You enter the dining room. It is utterly decayed with chairs flung randomly around the room. You get strange, ghostly vibe from this place. There is only the door to the east wing.
*DOOT*

rooms.description: You decide to sit in a chair, nothing happens. You can go back to the east wing

dynamic descriptions.description:
You take a seat at the end of the long table. With a blink of the eyes, a ghostly apparition appears hovering above where you sit. It drops a red key onto the table. An eerie voice calls out:
 "Sorry for my brother tormenting you, he doesn't take too kindly to strangers. Thank you for reclaiming the bust of my grandfather. Please take this key, it will let you back into the foyer as well as into the west wing."

As you pick of the red key, The ghost vanishes. The events at this table startled you to your core, but you feel a little safer knowing this ghost is looking out for you. You can go back into the east wing.

*DOOT*
You decide to sit in a chair, nothing happens. You can go back to the east wing
*DOOT*

rooms.description: You enter an old kitchen. The only things of note that are not completely decayed are a pantry and a fridge, but the fridge is locked shut by a rusted iron chain. You can go to the east wing.

rooms.description: You open the pantry and see rotten food everywhere. There is also a skeleton on the floor, its skull slightly flattened on one side. From here you can go back to the east wing.

rooms.description: You enter an old parlor room. There are chairs that once looked to be comfortable, but now are broken and eaten away. A painting hangs on the wall. There is also a fireplace, and you think you see something shiny inside behind the old iron grate. You can also go back to the east wing.

rooms.description: You cut open the gate of the old fireplace. There are only ashes. From here you can go back into the main area of the parlor.

*DOOT*

rooms.description: You enter someone's study. Papers are flung around a desk, and an old lamp covered with cobwebs sits on top. There is also a bookshelf in pristine condition, but with a noticeable gap where a book is missing. You can go back into the west wing.

rooms.description: The secret passage leads to a small room untouched by the decay of the rest of the house. In the corner of the room, there is skeleton sitting in a chair. From here you can go back to the study.

dynamic descriptions.description:

*DOOT*
As you grab the lexicon from the skeleton's hands, you head moves on its own to the blank wall next to the skeleton. Your vision then shifts to the skeleton army, marching. It lasts only a second before your once again see the blank wall in the secret room. Turning back to look at the skeleton, you see it is now pointing at the wall with one hand, and holding a trumpet in the other. The skeleton army calls to you, and you need only call back. You can go back to the study from here, but you feel there is more to this room than meets the eye.

rooms.doot level: The skeleton gives you an eager doot on the trumpet in response.

rooms.description: The hidden room is now completely dark, as the light shuts off after grabbing the key. From here, you can go back to the secret passage.

dynamic descriptions.description:
*DOOT*
As you call out the sound of the skeleton army, the wall fades, revealing a hidden door. You walk into a dark room, with a pedestal in the middle. A light shines down directly onto the pedestal, illuminating a key...a spoopy key.

rooms.description: You head outside into a garden. Vines and roots cover the entire ground. Ivy is covering every inch of the walls of both the house and a gardening shed. Thick bushes cover most of the garden. You can head back inside to the west wing, or try and carefully walk over to the shed. Something about the garden makes you think its more alive than it should be.

dynamic descriptions.description:
*DOOT*
You enter the garden, shears in hand. The entire garden seems to recoil at just the sight of the shears. The ivy, vines, and roots begin to recede, opening up more of the garden and revealing an overgrown brush. You can go into the shed, back inside to the west wing, or investigate the overgrown brush.
*DOOT*

rooms.description: You enter the gardening shed, and to no surprise find gardening supplies everywhere. Empty bags of fertilizer lie all over the ground, appearing to have each been torn into by something. You can grab some supplies, or go back into the garden.

rooms.description: Upon investigating the overgrown brush, you see a skeleton enveloped in roots. You can go back inside to the west wing, go back into the main part of the garden again, or go to the shed.

rooms.description: You are at the skeleton rave. You can walk into the light to go back to the foyer.

dynamic descriptions.description:
You stare at the painting and go full doot. Your vision immediately fades as you black out.
You awake in a room with flashing rave lights. the Skeleton army dances all around you, many dooting on their trumpets. Next to you is a magic trumpet with your name on it. It lets out a little doot as you look at it.

*DOOT*
 You are at the skeleton rave. You can walk into the light to go back to the foyer. 
*DOOT*

win messages.message: With all 5 missing items in place, the ghost appears. It thanks you for reclaiming all 5 prized possessions. The doors of the mansion creak open, and you step out into the night. You turn around for one more look at the place you have been stuck in all night, only to notice the mansion utterly collapsed and showing all signs of having burned down years ago. you turn to leave again, and you see the skeleton army, marching, trumpets in hand. You catch sight of your hand out of the corner of your eye; no skin remains. You realize everything you had with you is now gone, and you are a skeleton. All that remains is your magic trumpet, dooting happily at your transformation. You have joined the skeleton army. ENDING 2/2: 3spooky5me

With all 5 missing items in place, the ghost appears. It thanks you for reclaiming all 5 prized possessions. The doors of the mansion creak open, and you step out into the night. You turn around for one more look at the place you have been stuck in all night, only to notice the mansion utterly collapsed and showing all signs of having burned down years ago. You leave quickly, too afraid to turn around again. Although happy to have left alive, you cannot help but think of the strange vision you had in the secret room behind the study. It had to have its purpose, right? Perhaps you missed something, but its too late now. There is no going back. ENDING 1/2: escaped
